front.title: The definitions of 'fair and open'and their implication as used in IETF Standards Process defined in RFC2026 v3

abstract.t: This document tracks the use of the terms Fair and Open as used in RFC2026, and their impact on the processes of the IETF Operations. It also summarizes a set of requirements for other changes to the governance models so stay in concert with the concept that the ETFâ€™s processes be fair and open.
